WRITING.TITLE: The police have just released my mother-in-law after questioning her about the murder of her husband.
WRITING.TEXT: They only spoke to her for 2 minutes before coming to the conclusion he committed suicide.

WRITING.TITLE: The worst part about being a giraffe
WRITING.TEXT:
is having a lot of time to think about your mistakes when youre sinking into quicksand.
Credit. The Joke Cafe

WRITING.TITLE: A Roman walks into a bar,
WRITING.TEXT: sticks two fingers up to the barman and says, "Five beers please."

WRITING.TITLE: "Sometimes I wonder if you even remember what my face looks like,"
I have a pet Newt, his name is Tiny..
WRITING.TEXT:
My mate asked Why do you call him Tiny?
I replied Because hes minute

WRITING.TITLE: 3d-printers are now making guns.
WRITING.TEXT:
Pffft, that's nothing!
I've had a Canon printer for years.
credit [jokes](https://reddit.com)

WRITING.TITLE: I used to wake up feeling like a million bucks.
WRITING.TEXT: Now I wake up feeling like a bounced check.

WRITING.TITLE: "That is him." I said to my wife in the shopping centre.
WRITING.TEXT:
"That's Kenny Baker, the actor who played R2D2 in Star Wars."
"Are you sure?" she asked. "It doesn't look like him, go on over and ask."
A couple of minutes later I walked back over to her. "Well, what did he say?"
"Nothing." I said. "It's a rubbish bin."
